thread.title: Top Cryptos to Buy and Hold for Long Term: Qubetics ($TICS) Cross-Border Transactions Lead the Way While Near Protocol & SUI Push Boundaries
thread.title_full: Top Cryptos to Buy and Hold for Long Term: Qubetics ($TICS) Cross-Border Transactions Lead the Way While Near Protocol & SUI Push Boundaries

author: IndustryTrends
title: Top Cryptos to Buy and Hold for Long Term: Qubetics ($TICS) Cross-Border Transactions Lead the Way While Near Protocol & SUI Push Boundaries
text:
The cryptocurrency market’s buzzing with new opportunities, and the race to find the top cryptos to buy and hold for long term is more intense than ever. Qubetics ($TICS) has made waves with its revolutionary approach to cross-border transactions, and its ongoing presale is a phenomenon, selling over 408 million tokens to 13,800+ holders while raising $9.1 million. The price, a mere $0.0455, is slated to rise 10% by the weekend. If you’re looking for a sign to dive in, this might just be it.
Meanwhile, Near Protocol continues to redefine scalability in blockchain, making it a popular choice for developers. SUI, on the other hand, brings cutting-edge innovations to the table, focusing on performance and efficiency. Each project has its unique appeal, but Qubetics’ ability to solve real-world challenges gives it a serious edge.
Let’s unpack how these three crypto heavyweights are shaping the future of blockchain and why Qubetics is the standout choice for long-term holders.
If you’ve ever tried to send money across borders, you know the drill—long waits, high fees, and endless paperwork. Qubetics is flipping that script. Its Cross-Border Transactions feature is designed to simplify global payments for businesses, freelancers, and individuals alike. Imagine a world where sending $500 to a supplier overseas is as easy as clicking a button, with low fees and instant processing.
Here’s how it works: Powered by blockchain, Qubetics eliminates intermediaries like banks, ensuring faster transactions at a fraction of the cost. Picture this—a small business in Toronto paying its supplier in Shenzhen without worrying about fluctuating exchange rates or hidden fees. That’s the power of Qubetics. And thanks to its partnership with SWFT Blockchain, token swaps are seamless and efficient, making $TICS a must-have for anyone engaged in global trade.
But it’s not just about businesses. For professionals working remotely, Qubetics makes receiving payments a breeze. No more losing a chunk of your hard-earned money to hefty PayPal fees. Whether you’re a graphic designer in Chicago or a writer in Vancouver, $TICS makes sure your money goes where it should—in your pocket.
The numbers back it up. The presale has already sold over 408 million tokens, and with $9.1 million raised, Qubetics is proving its value to a growing community of over 13,800 holders. With analysts predicting significant ROI post-presale, $TICS is not just a token; it’s a ticket to financial empowerment.
While Qubetics focuses on practical, real-world applications, Near Protocol has carved a niche as a developer’s dream platform. Its unique sharding technology, known as Nightshade, allows the network to process thousands of transactions per second without compromising decentralisation or security. It’s like having a highway with unlimited lanes—no traffic, no delays.
Near’s user-friendly interface makes it stand out in a space often criticised for being overly complex. Developers can easily build and deploy dApps without navigating a steep learning curve. This simplicity has attracted projects ranging from DeFi to gaming, making Near a versatile and reliable choice for blockchain enthusiasts.
SUI is another name that’s popping up in discussions about the top cryptos to buy and hold for long term. This Layer 1 blockchain focuses on high throughput and low latency, making it a favourite for applications requiring real-time performance. Think gaming, finance, and e-commerce—industries where every millisecond counts.
What makes SUI unique is its object-centric data model. Unlike traditional blockchains that require every node to process every transaction, SUI allows nodes to focus only on the data they need. The result? Faster speeds and a more efficient network. Imagine a multiplayer online game where actions happen in real-time without lag. That’s the kind of experience SUI aims to deliver.
At the heart of Qubetics’ appeal is its Cross-Border Transactions feature. Let’s break it down. Traditional cross-border payments rely on a web of banks, payment processors, and intermediaries. Each step adds time and fees, making the process cumbersome and costly. Blockchain technology eliminates these intermediaries, but not all blockchains are created equal.
Qubetics takes cross-border transactions to the next level by integrating its services with SWFT Blockchain. This partnership ensures that token swaps are not just fast but also cost-effective. Whether you’re an entrepreneur importing goods or a family member sending money back home, Qubetics delivers a seamless experience.
Why is this important? Because financial inclusion isn’t just a buzzword; it’s a necessity. Millions of people around the world lack access to affordable financial services. By making cross-border transactions efficient and accessible, Qubetics is democratising financial freedom. And that’s a game-changer.
When it comes to the top cryptos to buy and hold for long term, Qubetics, Near Protocol, and SUI each bring something unique to the table. Near excels in scalability and developer tools, while SUI sets new benchmarks for performance. But Qubetics stands out for its real-world impact, especially in the realm of cross-border transactions.
The presale is your chance to get in early on a project that’s solving problems today while preparing for tomorrow. With $TICS priced at $0.0455 and a 10% price surge looming, there’s no better time to act. Don’t just watch the crypto revolution from the sidelines—be a part of it with Qubetics.
